about.title: Company Overview
about.subtitle: YuQar Group was founded in 2017 by Gontse Ntshegi who is a founder and CEO. He currently holds BSc degrees in Physics and Computer Science from the University of Cape Town. Born in 1990, and from Mamelodi Township he has worked extremely hard to be where he is today. His aim is to build a company that competes locally, Continentally and globally, that will be recognized and respected in the Technology, Engineering and Entertainment industries.
